title: Food Personality Quiz
description: Discover your food personality type based on your choices!

questions.text: Q1/12: You wake up in a cozy little cookie cabin in the clouds. Your stomach grumbles. What do you do first?

options.text: Dash outside barefoot to find the first food stand that's open—who has time to wait?
Take a deep breath, stretch, and boil some herbs for morning tea—let's not forget we're in a house made of literal food.

questions.text: Q2/12: The clouds part and reveal a floating market of foods from around the world. You only have time for one stop.

options.text: The one stall that sells things you've never even heard of—mystery is delicious.
The corner offering 3 for 1 deals plus samples? Say less.

questions.text: Q3/12: While shopping in the floating market, someone invites you to lunch with a group of new people. How do you respond?

options.text: You bet! I'll bring snacks and juicy stories—let's make it a feast to remember!
Where are we going? What's on the menu? Let me do a quick vibes check.

questions.text: Q4/12: During lunch, you're offered two enchanted utensils. One is a fork that speeds up every meal, and the other is a spoon that makes each bite last longer.

options.text: Fork — please, time waits for no snack.
Spoon — food should be savored and enjoyed.

questions.text: Q5/12: After a hearty meal, you decide to explore the town. How do you settle in?

options.text: Scout the area for essentials. No need to overbuy; you've got what you need.
Dive headfirst into the dessert lagoon because, let's be real, new places = new stress.

questions.text: Q6/12: During your exploration, you find a glowing map. One path leads to a mystery feast, the other to a well-reviewed diner.

options.text: Let's go off the grid—I want food I've never seen before.
I'm going where the stars are high, the prices are low, and the portions are ✨respectable✨.

questions.text: Q7/12: Excited about your new findings, you can't wait to share this with your friends. How would you break the news?

options.text: Let's go together! There's something for everyone there!
Suggest takeaway—bundle deals hit different when shared.

questions.text: Q8/12: While walking back to your cabin, the Doof Police stops you. "Unauthorized snack detected. Show your verification."

options.text: Present your perfectly filed receipts, coupons, and cloud tax exemption form.
Panics and crash out.

questions.text: Q9/12: Regardless, you've been captured and brought to the Cotton Candy King. To lighten your sentence, you:

options.text: Tear up, sob dramatically, and offer the King a sweet bribe.
Sweet talk your way through it with maximum charm.

questions.text: Q10/12: "Relax" the King booms. "I see you wish to return home. What do you miss most?"

options.text: My friends and family. I miss the little things—shared meals, inside jokes, warm hugs.
I've got unfinished biz, adventures waiting, work to complete. There's still so much left to do!

questions.text: Q11/12: The King chuckles in acknowledgement. "Before I send you off, I shall grant you one magical food wish. What'll it be, traveler?"

options.text: Teleporting tiffin box that brings you rare and spicy eats from every corner of the globe—fresh, fast, and full of surprises.
A magical wallet that refills itself with food vouchers, buddy bundles, and buy 1 get 1 deals. There's always enough to go around.

questions.text: Q12/12: At last, you're back home after an exhausting, flavor-filled journey. Where do you recharge?

options.text: 24hr fast food joint. Quick, convenient and nostalgic.
A cinnamon-scented bakery where everything feels like a warm hug.

results.Impulsive: You're spontaneous and eager to try new things! You follow your gut and make quick decisions when it comes to food.
results.Mindful: You appreciate the ritual of eating and take time to enjoy each bite. Food is an experience to be savored.
results.Adventurous: You're always on the hunt for unique flavors and exotic dishes. Food is an adventure for you!
results.Practical: You value good deals and proven favorites. Why risk disappointment when you know what works?
results.Extrovert: Social dining is your jam! Food tastes better when shared with others.
results.Cautious: You like to know what you're getting into before committing. Research first, eat later.
results.Efficient: Time is precious, and meals are functional. You appreciate food but don't dwell on it.
results.Indulgent: You believe in savoring every bite and making meals last. Food is one of life's great pleasures.
results.Minimalist: You keep things simple and focus on essentials. No frills needed.
results.Comfort-Seeker: Food is comfort for you. Sweet treats and familiar flavors help you feel at home.
results.Risk-Taker: Unknown cuisine? Weird combinations? You're first in line! Food should be an adventure.
results.Value-Conscious: You appreciate quality and quantity at a fair price. Smart food choices matter.
results.Community-Oriented: Sharing food experiences brings you joy. The more, the merrier!
results.Resourceful: You find clever ways to maximize your food experience and share the bounty.
results.Organized: You plan ahead and keep everything in order. No surprises in your food routine.
results.Spontaneous: You wing it when it comes to food! Planning just gets in the way of the experience.
results.Emotional: Food connects deeply to your feelings. Comfort food is your emotional support.
results.Charismatic: You can charm your way into any food situation. Social connections matter.
results.Relationship-Focused: Food is about the people you share it with. Connections matter most.
results.Goal-Oriented: Food fuels your next adventure or task. It's important but not the main focus.
results.Variety-Seeker: You crave diversity in your diet. The same meal twice? Not if you can help it!
results.Generous: Sharing food brings you joy. There's always room for one more at your table.
results.Convenience-Lover: Quick, accessible food fits your busy lifestyle. Efficiency matters.
